name: Witch Queen

trait.name: Heightened Spell (3/Day)
text: As a bonus action, a target of the witch queen's choice within 60 feet of her has disadvantage on its saving throw against her next spell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The witch queen has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
text: While in sunlight, the witch queen has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Spellcasting
text: The witch queen is an 8th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The witch queen has the following Wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): acid splash, mage hand, message, ray of frost
• 1st level (4 slots): burning hands, magic missile, sleep
• 2nd level (3 slots): invisibility, spider climb, suggestion
• 3rd level (3 slots): blink, fear, lightning bolt

action.name: Maddening Scimitar
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Charisma saving throw or use its reaction to move up to its speed and make a melee attack against the nearest enemy of the witch queen.

spells: acid splash, mage hand, message, ray of frost, burning hands, magic missile, sleep, invisibility, spider climb, suggestion, blink, fear, lightning bolt, blight, confusion
